contentList.content: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Stronger Bosses</LSTag>: When this entity fall down to 0 HP, it stays at 1 HP and is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVULNERABLE">invulnerable</LSTag> for the rest of its turn.
The next time damage would reduce the affected entity to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it remains conscious with [2] hit point left.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Stronger Bosses</LSTag>: This entity is immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysing</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISON_CRAWLER_MUCUS_CONDITION">Incapacitate</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOMINATE_PERSON">Charm</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POLYMORPH_SHEEP">Polymorph</LSTag>.

Affected entity can't move or take actions, bonus actions, or reactions.

Attacks against the entity are always Critical Hits if the attacker is within [1].

Your reflexes are enhanced by the light weight of your equipment. If you are not wearing Medium or Heavy Armour and have nothing equipped in your Off-Hand, you gain a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
This entity is guarded against Death. If an attack would drop it below [1] HP, this entity stays invulnerable with [2] HP for [3] turns insteed.
This entity is stronger, in a way or another.
This entity is immune to all damage type, all kind of Crowd Control and cannot be moved against its will.
Protect a creature from death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it remains conscious with 1 hit point left.
Increase <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> of nerby Giths by [1], and give theim <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEE_INVISIBILITY">True Sight</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1], as long as the affected entity stays within [2] of the Gishra.
This entity is a God or an avatar of a God. Better not mess-up with these.
This entity is leading the pack and gets additionnal bonuses.
